website_summaries.verdict: One of the best figure skates available for beginner to intermediate skaters, with great support through the boot and ankle.
pros: Very stiff construction, but accurate sizing for a good fit
Good for novice skaters transitioning to more complex moves like spins and jumps
cons: Breaking them in can take a couple of weeks or more
Blades must be sharpened before first use, and can rust easily if not dried immediately
Plastic base and heel, rather than wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner skater coming back after like 10 years after I did some skating as a kid. These are the perfect skates, really. Make sure you take good care of them, because they will see you through some intense training! I'm usually a size 9.5 in regular shoes, but I got 9 here. They feel a bit tight around the ankles at first, but it's because you have to break them in. Believe me, it's better for them to be snug. Just make sure your toes aren't touching the front!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of skates! It's perfect for a beginner with wide feet like me. The most important thing is DO NOT BUY THE SAME SIZE AS YOUR SHOE SIZE because they'll be too big. If there's a pro shop nearby, go there to measure your feet and try them on. If there's no shop, find the guide to measure your feet online and follow Jackson size chart. (ex. my normal shoe size is 7.5-8 but I wear 6.5 skates.)
customer_reviews.author: Karn

customer_reviews.title: These skates were incredibly comfortable from the first time I put them on
customer_reviews.text: These skates were incredibly comfortable from the first time I put them on. They're also true to size. You need to have them sharpened once you receive them, but other than that, everything else is ready to go. They are a good quality skate at a reasonable price. I'm a recreational skater (1-2X week) who is currently taking lessons, and they work well for me. I don't know if they would be great for higher level skaters, but for anyone looking for a comfortable and durable pair of skates, you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: TracyBee

customer_reviews.title: Good skate, poor details
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these pretty regularly (about a couple times a week, sometimes more) since the very end of November and the hooks at the top of the skate are extrememly flimsy. I just snapped one off today while lacing my skate. I should not have those falling off because I keep my skates tightened. Extremely disappointed, especially due to the price. My cheaper skates never did this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was bumped up to Basic 5 in ice skating lessons and I knew I had to stop renting skates for her. She was fitted for skates at the ice rink, but they didn't have her size. So we were told which skates to buy and I ordered them. They arrived quickly and they fit her perfectly and wow did they make a difference in her performance. Her improvement was evident the very next class. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Je'Niece N. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skates, lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Very good skates for the beginning skater. They hold up well enough for most beginner stuff but are not supposed to be used for any jumps due to the low ankle support rating. I was informed by a former near-Olympian friend of mine that they could probably handle up to single rotation jumps but wouldn't push it too far past that. Came with factory oil on the blades. THEY WILL NEED TO BE SHARPENED. The factory sharpening isn't very deep and I was sliding around with no grip. Upon first sharpening I suddenly found myself with edges and have been learning them since. Would recommend to anyone wanting to get into figure skating!
customer_reviews.author: PhantomsAria

customer_reviews.title: Love my skates.
customer_reviews.text: I'm street size 8. Bought 7 in skates, they fit like a glove. My feet arches hurt so bad the first time wore them, second time around I broke them in already and I was super comfortable. The level of support they provide made me feel stable on ice. Can't wait for my first figure skating class on the weekend. Lovely skates, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cute troll-shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter has just started taking lessons. These are great skates for her level. We used the Jackson measuring guide from the Jackson website and they were a perfect fit. Her feet measured just shy of 10 inches in length which is a size 8. (She wears a size 9 sketchers tennis shoes). The skates appear to be well made, she says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: Very good skate. We just purchased these to replace the identical ones that were a size smaller. Our 4 year old is at Basic 4 level right now, and her skate coach said we should plan to stay in this level of skates for a long time. Our daughter skates multiple hours, 5+ times a week, and she never complains about her skates. They give her the proper support and comfort and have worn well with heavy use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great skat for little price
customer_reviews.text: It is slightly larger than Reidells but they are perfect for my daughter. She wears a 10.5 for regular shoes. I ordered a 11.5 here - a 1/2 size bigger so she can grow. My daughter just started ice skating six months ago so she is not jumping. If she was, I wouldn’t have gone a bit bigger. These skates give her the perfect support around the ankles she needed. She needed a strong boot so that she wouldn’t collapse her ankles. These have worked perfectly. They are cushioned inside so they do not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie C. Milian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates! See professional for fitting before purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Please see a professional before you purchase any pair of skates! Don’t be like me and end up purchasing skates that are too big! I was like “Yeah no I know my skate size psh” and ended up buying a half size too big. So please, visit your local ice rink before you purchase so you can get a proper fitting and then purchase these skates. Getting off my figure skating soapbox, these skates are amazing! Even though they’re slightly too big, they’ve really improved my skating prowess! Jumps and spins have become a lot easier, they’re super comfortable as well, and they’re made out of really good, wear-and-tear resistant material. I’d honestly buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Peralta

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: It's a pity these didn't work for me. They felt incredibly durable and supportive. The only problem was that they were way too small around the ball of my foot. I could barely put my foot inside them. I measured my foot according to the chart. I purchased a size 8C; my street shoes are a US Women's 9. I'm disappointed because Jackson are supposed to be the better option for people with wide feet compared to Reidell. Anyway, I'm returning them and going with a more sportier K2 Alexis recreational skate.
customer_reviews.author: Nad

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got these skates a year ago and tried on initially and thought they were fine. Until months later when I actually skate on ice, these are horrible! The fit is even much worse than cheap rental skates. I paid extra $20 to get them sharpened and throwing good money after bad. My main issue is it is way too tight and uncomfortable around my ankles and I don’t have big or unusual ankles at all, so this really comes very shocking. I am wondering if what I got were fakes? I have tried other Jackson brand skates and never had these issues before!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Jackson Mystique Skates
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Jackson Mystique skates. I have skated on them twice but I will have them heat molded this week. Apparently that is what is recommended so the skates will be molded to my feet. The comfort is improving too and I'm sure it will continue once molded and broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Yisraela

customer_reviews.title: Ice skate nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The first time my daughter wore them one of the clamps broke on the side then the next day another one broke, been dealing with the company for 3 days to take care of this matter and still not taken care of, dont feel these skates are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for figure skaters
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Jackson Ultima Mystique ice skates I have purchased for my daughter - and I'm sure I will be buying them again next year. While the skates certainly last more than a year - her feet are still growing - so when she is done with them, we pass them down to younger skaters. The skates are great. Boot is stiff enough to support her ankle but soft enough to be comfortable. Blades sharpen well and hold their edge. Used the sizing guide to get the right fit!!! Vendor was on time with delivery and product arrived in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: ljerome

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for an intermediate figure-skater
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates. They are comfortable, seem to be sized correctly and high quality...
customer_reviews.author: M. Worley

customer_reviews.title: Teen granddaughter loves tThem
customer_reviews.text: My teenage granddaughter loves these skates. Her last pair were from a popular sports superstore. These are a step above. She wore them around the house (with guards) for one or two days and the one hot spot disappeared. She's been skating recreationally with them for almost a full season and still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Danzee

customer_reviews.title: They are working out for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after trying the Riedell brand first. These are way better fit and looks nicer, more stylish too. My daughter is enjoying them. They fit true to size but I would highly recommend you get measured before selecting a size.
customer_reviews.author: chae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my daughters ice skating instructor. After trying another pair before this purchase, these were perfect. My daughter reported that they were comfortable on her feet and supported the ankles very well.
customer_reviews.author: jenn bryan

customer_reviews.title: Almost no padding
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking skates. Wore them once and they obviously need some time to work into them...quite stiff at the moment. I wish they were just a bit more padded. I am thinking of purchasing an insole to at least soften the bottom of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love these skates!
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates! Fit was perfect, when ordering any skates be sure to go by manufacture size chart. They are very well made and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: melissa white

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit my son great. He's a size 10.5 shoe. The 9.5 skate is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. The texture is exactly the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: These ice-skating shoes are what I was expected!! I really like them. The texture is exactly the same as in the picture! It's dope.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenttthan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skates, we buy them every year as the foot grows! This is our fourth pair.
customer_reviews.author: BklynG

customer_reviews.title: Jacksons rock.
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Jackson skates both for myself and my little girl. They provide excellent support at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: John Coonrod

customer_reviews.title: All around great
customer_reviews.text: True to skate sizing as listed. These fit like a dream and my son loves them. They cake well packaged and on time. Will buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K

customer_reviews.title: Great recreational skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates came pre-sharpened for me, and they are more stiff than I thought they would be, but I also have yet to break them in completely. Beautiful, came in perfect condition. Good for the recreational skater like me.
customer_reviews.author: J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great skates at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were recommended by several people and I bought a pair for each of my girls. What a difference from the skates at the ice rink! They are both able to spin better and perform the moves required for their skating lessons. Instructors are happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: N W

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice skates! They came sharpened and ready to use
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice skates! They came sharpened and ready to use. There is some nice padding, though I think this makes the skate run a tiny bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Bex Fam

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Having wider feet in general makes things difficult. So you could imagine my search in trying to find ice skates that fit! I bought these as an extreme beginner to practice with my daughter after her classes. I was not disappointed. I used the measuring guide and bought a size 8C. I normally wear between a 8.5/9W and these fit perfect. They have great ankle support, are easy to put on, and fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. Makes a difference when skating to have good skates.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Casler

customer_reviews.title: Great ice skate, lasts for years.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they changed the clasps, much more durable than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ankle Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my ice skating class and I have been using it on ice for 6 hours every week. It was very stiff to start with but after 2 weeks, it was comfortable to skate in. I have weak ankles and this skates help a lot. The blades came sharper than rental skates' blades.
customer_reviews.author: LexieS

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investments I have ever made. These skates are like heaven, gliding on ice like the latest luxury car. The difference between these and rental skates is HUGE. If you skate a few times per season or just learning to skate- BUY them!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelaiy

customer_reviews.title: Classy, comfy skates
customer_reviews.text: Fit, looks and construction are excellent. Skates are very comfortable. I am a new scater and had trouble with the toe pick. The bottom pick extends out and down from the blade and caught on the ice. So I ground off the bottom picks and now I love the skates!
customer_reviews.author: sagwino

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Skate
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates, they are great for beginners whose feet change size often. Do not let the price fool you, they are a VERY HIGH QUALITY skate!! Seller shipped very quickly & packaged with care
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my skates!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. I ordered the 7's first and they were too small (I take a 7.5 in shoes). I exchanged them for size 8 and they fit great. A bit stiff, but my feet were very comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: happyamazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Jackson is known for their quality and size selection in ...
customer_reviews.text: Jackson is known for their quality and size selection in ice skates. Make sure you have your feet "fitted" before ordering skates. Ice Skates are meant to fit very snugly to support your ankle and weight. Usually ice skates should be 1 to 1 1/2 sizes smaller than your regular shoe size. The Jackson website provides directions for measuring.
customer_reviews.author: tastars

customer_reviews.title: Nice Skates for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: The guide for finding my the skate size is clear and accurate. The skates is much more comfortable than the public ones.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton Wong

customer_reviews.title: Much better than rentals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old daughter, she had been renting skates at the rink prior to this. She says she moves more swiftly and gracefully across the ice wearing these. She also says they're a comfortable fit and she is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great skate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just began skating and she loves these skates. Good value for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these skates - they fit her perfect. The first day they were tight and her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates - they fit her perfect. The first day they were tight and her feet were sore. She wore them a few days later and skated beautifully. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good for ice skating classes
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and the ice skating teacher accepted these skates. I had to return other ones that the teacher said were not appropriate. Very happy with the skates! And great for ice skating clases!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Tena

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new skates. The size seems a little smaller than normal, but it fits her well
customer_reviews.author: MRYKAT28

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Size ran a little big, I am glad I bought size 5. Usually I ware 5.5-6. Need a little break-in, but after that feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 12 year old daughter and she loves them!! She’s a level 4. She loves the extra cushion in the ankle area, that her old skates didn’t have!! Will definitely purchase again as her sizes change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great First Skates
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by our Ice rink's Figure skating program manager for my daughter's first pair of ice skates once she began Basic 3. We were told that they were a great beginner pair that would help her transition easily to advanced skates later. She immediately began skating better than with the rental pairs she used before. She loves them! Amazon had the best price we could find and although not prime, they were delivered quickly even during the Christmas holiday.
customer_reviews.author: gt2015

customer_reviews.title: Lovely skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter taking skating lessons, she has weak ankles and these have been amazing!!! Very comfortable and good quality .
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The quality exceeded my already high expectations and the blades came sharp and ready to go😁
customer_reviews.author: Donte Battles

customer_reviews.title: The product is good, but not new.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good for beginning skate learners like Basic 1,2,3,4, and 5. But problem was what I got which seemed not a new one. I found someone’s return label in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I love it! ~
customer_reviews.text: I buy used one but it came brand new one without box. I surprised after I got this. I love it!~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Boot was extremely stiff. I should have bought a higher quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great , comfortable skates
customer_reviews.text: Awesome skates! I really like them!!!! I feel like a professional now! Thanks guys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and good blades
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fitting skates for general skating. Tight at first but molds to the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert (Buff) Leboeuf

customer_reviews.title: ... is made with suede leather but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: The boot is made with suede leather but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Skate! My son loved them and said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aquav

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing skates, fit perfectly. Came nice and sharp and ready to use. I have put quite a few hours on them and they hold up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit just as expected. Skates came sharpened and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: sandym

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old thought the skates were very comfortable even the first wear. She did an hour practice skate before her lesson and her feet weren’t hurting at all! Very good skates. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff.
customer_reviews.text: The skates were fine but a little stiff on my daughter's feet. She has worn them weekly for a month and they are still not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda S

customer_reviews.title: Secret life savers
customer_reviews.text: These skates took me all the way through jumps up until the loop jump. I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. My 5yo loves his and he has had great success on the ice
customer_reviews.author: Chad C. Ritterspach

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. The sizing chart was spot on
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The sizing chart was spot on. I am an advance roller skater and I know how important it is to have the right boot for skating. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These skates were of high quality, and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: scott m. jones

customer_reviews.title: Love sizing directions
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and size assistance is great, just follow their directions
customer_reviews.author: Bsisms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and confortable figure ice skates. No complains so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Vidaal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice skates hold up well still very stiff and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my wife like a glove. And they should... She spent days measuring her feet using both the Jackson and Reidell charts.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzyduck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they’re a little too big which makes the toungue slide down
customer_reviews.author: atomicfox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality skates worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The skates fit great, really comfortable and easy to skate in
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Conley

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit love the skates ideal for a beginner just learning the basics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, used just used once need to see ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit , used just used once need to see how it works
customer_reviews.author: iPhone 4s User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice skating shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always love to shop from amzon. It is easy , fast, and excelent!
customer_reviews.author: marjan

customer_reviews.title: My teacher recommended this brand and I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: I returned to ice skating after a 50 year absence. My teacher recommended this brand and I am very happy. They fit well with not pinching or pain. A real winner.
customer_reviews.author: bilezmom

customer_reviews.title: I love it and great to use on ice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. However the blades were not sharpened when it arrived and I had to bring it to a shop to have them sharpened. Nonetheless, I love it and great to use on ice, it definitely made being on ice comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3RN

customer_reviews.title: They are holding up quite nicely and handling my learning to skate time
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these about once a week for almost a year now. No complaints. They are holding up quite nicely and handling my learning to skate time.
customer_reviews.author: David DuPont

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, My daught likes it, But it needs time to be familuar with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Construction is CHEAP! Soles are plastic, blade does not come sharpened (or at least as sharp as it’s supposed to be), blade looks like cheaply cut sheet metal, blade is attached to bottom with small philips head screws, blade isn’t even flush with bottom of skate. Took one look at them out of the box and saw a very poor quality skate. Returned immediately. Shame on you for selling such a poor quality skate for $100.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for prompt delivery. The faux-wood heel didn't do it for me,though. Guess I am old school. It was like getting a Mercedes with Pinto wood panelling.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary j shaw

customer_reviews.title: stiff and painful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting flexible leather. They had stiff pads inside that pressed on my legs, causing bad bruising. I had flown to Montreal to skate for a week, and after one session in these, could not skate again 'til the bruising was healed. So now I'm back to rental skates, which never hurt my legs.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyone

customer_reviews.title: LADIES FIGURE SKATE
customer_reviews.text: SKATES I HAVE NOT USED BY THE TIME .. THE BOOT AND BLADES FINE PARCEN EU LOQ IS NOT MUCH LIKE THE BASE OF THE BOOT IS PLASTIC BUT ALWAYS WEAR LEATHER AND VERY GOOD AND DURABLE Hopefully these DUREN enough and DEN ME ALSO VERY GOOD RESULT
customer_reviews.author: Aracely

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support!!
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my daughter who will be going into level 4 and she needed something with better ankle support. OMG what an amazing ice skates! Great ankle support, very well done. I used Jackson’s size chart and got 3.5 very she is pleased with how they feel on her feet. She loves ice skating in them and says it’s much easier to do so. Needed to be sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter skated for 6hrs on first use.
customer_reviews.text: 4stars for now. I hope this will last. But i am happy that my 5yo daughter never complained of any pain coming from the boots. Tho she complained of getting painful legs because she overworked out, and she just doesnt want to stop skating. She skated for 6hours, and didnt wanna stop. Way way better than rental boots. The boot feels really hard tho, so i was expecting her to get blisters on first try and break in stage, but no blisters at all. Just very very very tired legs coz she had really fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

product_meta.title: Jackson Ultima Mystique Series / Figure Ice Skates for Women, Girls, Men, Boys
product_meta.description:
Leather upper polyurethane coated for easy care. Softer topline for added comfort. Synthetic lining comfortable and durable. Flex notch for added flexibility.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :16.1 x 14.7 x 4.9 inches; 5 Pounds
 * Item model number :JS1490
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :December 12, 2002
 * Manufacturer :Jackson Ultima
 * ASIN :B00NAY6F5M

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #81,544 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #8 inFigure Skates 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars193 ratings Leather upper polyurethane coated for easy care. Softer topline for added comfort. Synthetic lining comfortable and durable. Flex notch for added flexibility.
feature_bullets: JS1490 for Women; JS1491 for Girls; JS1494 for Toddler (Girls); JS1592 for Men; JS1593 for Boys; JS1595 for Toddler (Boys)
Leather upper polyurethane coated and Stylized PVC outsole for easy care, Flex notch for added flexibility and Synthetic lining comfortable and durable
Full quarter and extra ankle padding and Foam backed vinyl/mesh comfort tongue
Jackson all purpose chrome blade attached with screws
